comment.author: 28288340@N03
comment._content: Beautiful shot of the Willie. I drew this one for a friend who was a crewman on PR-21 prior to it being shot down by the North Koreans. []

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/wingsnstuff]  Thanks for sharing the image your drew. It is fantastic! SDASM- Staff
